Html:
Hi,

It took me over 20 minutes to install CompositeApplicationGuidance-Feb2009.exe on a Quad+4G Ram machine. The average copying speed is under 20KB/sec.

Is this normal since it seems a simple unzipping?

Thanks.

Kai

I've seen this on a friends new x64 system (doesn't do it on mine...).  

Googled "slow unzip x64" - saw one solution was to turn off "OneCare" - perhaps you'll get lucky or find another solution.  Please let us know what you find.

Thanks.

I tried to unzip the Source.zip manually using winrar. It took about 5 seconds.
